attributes.action: Review nurses pay increase following 2021 budget.
attributes.additional_details: Nearly everyone is outraged by the Government's decision to only increase nurses pay by 1%. Nurses are insulted and the public agree following their amazing commitment to their work during 2020 and 2021.
attributes.background: Look at increasing nurses pay to 12% following the insulting 1% offered in the budget.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253
